pages.text: Lacusia crops will transport items from A to B along a flat surface. When a crop next to an inventory is given an RS signal, it will extract any items from that inventory and transport them until it finds a valid inventory. Upon reaching a junction, it will loop through S-W-N-E directions for the first valid crop/inventory to insert into, and will reverse the direction to search in when given an RS signal.

pages.name: Lacusia Crop
pages.text: Flip the page to see the recipe for these seeds.
